hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT sub.id, sub.createrId, sub.createTime, sub.content, sub.flag, sub.departmentId, sub.title, sub.moduleId, sub.lastUpdateTime, sub.parentId, sub.createrName FROM t_sm2_subject AS sub, ( SELECT sub_id as subId FROM t_sm2_subject_master WHERE user_uid = :uid ) subIds WHERE sub.id = subIds.subId AND sub.moduleId = :moduleId ORDER BY sub.lastUpdateTime DESC
SELECT COUNT(sub.id) FROM t_sm2_subject AS sub, ( SELECT sub_id as subId FROM t_sm2_subject_master WHERE user_uid = :uid ) subIds WHERE sub.id = subIds.subId AND sub.moduleId = :moduleId
SELECT COUNT(trans.id) FROM t_sm2_subject_trans trans , ( SELECT subjectId subId FROM t_sm2_step WHERE id=:stepId) step WHERE trans.sub_id = step.subId AND trans.user_uid = :uid ;

SELECT st.id,st.name FROM t_sm2_step st, ( SELECT subjectId FROM t_sm2_step, ( SELECT stepId FROM t_sm2_progress WHERE id = :progId ) pro WHERE pro.stepId = t_sm2_step.id ) sub WHERE st.subjectId = sub.subjectId;

SELECT t_sm2_progress.id, t_sm2_progress.name, t_sm2_progress.content, t_sm2_progress.createrId, t_sm2_progress.createTime, t_sm2_progress.lastUpdateTime, t_sm2_progress.stepId, rcount.rcou, zcount.zcou, zaned.zd FROM t_sm2_progress left join ( SELECT count(progress_id) as rcou,progress_id FROM t_sm2_reads GROUP BY progress_id ) rcount on t_sm2_progress.id = rcount.progress_id left join ( SELECT count(progress_id) as zcou,progress_id FROM t_sm2_zan GROUP BY progress_id ) zcount on t_sm2_progress.id = zcount.progress_id left join ( SELECT count(progress_id) as zd,progress_id FROM t_sm2_zan WHERE t_sm2_zan.user_uid=:uid GROUP BY progress_id ) zaned on t_sm2_progress.id = zaned.progress_id WHERE t_sm2_progress.stepId=:stepId ORDER BY t_sm2_progress.createTime DESC

SELECT sub.id as id , sub.createrId as uid,sub.title as title FROM t_sm2_subject sub, ( SELECT subjectId FROM t_sm2_step step, ( SELECT stepId FROM t_sm2_progress WHERE id=:progId ) progs WHERE step.id = progs.stepId ) steps WHERE sub.id = steps.subjectId

SELECT t_sm2_module.id,sub.counts FROM t_sm2_module LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(id) as counts ,moduleId FROM t_sm2_subject, ( SELECT sub_id FROM t_sm2_subject_master WHERE user_uid = :uid AND (flag=0 OR flag=2) ) master WHERE t_sm2_subject.id = master.sub_id GROUP BY moduleId ) sub ON t_sm2_module.id = sub.moduleId
